title.narrative: Hybridization of Diesel Engines of Multifunctional Platforms with Solar Systems

description.narrative: 1. Strengthening of regulatory, policy and institutional framework for Renewable Energy adoption and rural electrification,2. Knowledge and capacity development supporting public and private sector to provide better quality of service to the rural areas,3. Availability of, and access to financing of Renewable Energy and Energy Efficiency Projects,4. Deployment of hybrid solar energy Technologies and Applications,5 Monitoring and evaluation; information dissemination and replication,project management cost

participating-org.narrative: - Ministry of environment and forest resources -Ministry of Grassroots Development of Craft, Youth and Youth Employment (MDBAJEJ) -Grassroots Development Support Programme (PRADEB ) -Ministry of mines and energy (MME) -Togo Electricity Company(CEET)
